DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read SharePoint and OneDrive tenant settings
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the application to read the tenant-level settings in SharePoint and OneDrive on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Read SharePoint and OneDrive tenant settings
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the application to read the tenant-level settings in SharePoint and OneDrive on your behalf.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read SharePoint and OneDrive tenant settings
Application.adminDescription: Allows the application to read the tenant-level settings of SharePoint and OneDrive, without a signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and change SharePoint and OneDrive tenant settings
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the application to read and change the tenant-level settings of SharePoint and OneDrive on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Read and change SharePoint and OneDrive tenant settings
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the application to read and change the tenant-level settings of SharePoint and OneDrive on your behalf.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and change SharePoint and OneDrive tenant settings
Application.adminDescription: Allows the application to read and change the tenant-level settings of SharePoint and OneDrive, without a signed-in user.
